mapper.select: select * from users where user_name=#{user_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and password=#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT stu_id,stu_name,stu_sex,stu_class,cour_name,grades FROM course,grade,students WHERE course.`cour_id`=grade.`grd_cour_id` AND students.`stu_id`=grade.`grd_stu_id` ORDER BY stu_name,grades
SELECT * FROM course,grade,students WHERE course.`cour_id`=grade.`grd_cour_id` AND students.`stu_id`=grade.`grd_stu_id` AND stu_name like CONCAT('%',#{stu_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grade(grd_stu_id,grd_cour_id,grades) VALUES(#{stu_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},(SELECT cour_id FROM course WHERE cour_name=#{cour_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),#{grades,jdbcType=INTEGER})
